column99: Full-Time Experienced Chef @ Hot Pot Republic
column100:
Full time 
 146A Vesterbrogade, 1620 Copenhagen, Denmark 
 Start ASAP 
   
 We are seeking an experienced chef who has extensive working expertise from a busy restaurant and can keep calm under pressure. The team is energetic and international- the company spirit is vibrant and innovative with a strong sense of inclusion and community.  
   
 We Offer 
   
 
 A career development possibility of becoming the head chef. 
 A great working atmosphere where you will bring a smile home after work. 
 The first hot pot social dining experience brand, most probably, in the entire Denmark! 
 A flexible shift plan that takes care of your private life. 
 We are a small and competent team where people treat each other like a family. 
 An environment where you feel proud of your job and your colleagues. 
 A competitive salary and a pension scheme. 
 Staff discounts; team building activities, the warm fuzzy feeling of working together serving hot pot love! 
 We are in the beautiful  Vesterbrogade  neighbourhood! 
 
   
 You Are 
 
 A trained and experienced chef with 5 years or more work experience in busy restaurants. 
 You have the ambition to future develop a career in our expansion plan. 
 Have a systematic and structured approach to work, you perform well in multi-tasking in an efficient manner under time pressure. 
 You are responsible, hardworking and independent. 
 You have a strong sense of quality and hygiene. You hold high integrity in your work. 
 You thrive in a fast pace environment and under constant change. 
 You are fluent in English in sharing your life adventures with our team! 
 
   
 Main Responsibilities 
 
 Ensuring daily operations including prep, planning, inventory management, cooking, plating up, etc. 
 Be an integral part of developing new dishes --- we support your creative initiatives! 
 Give guidance to kitchen assistants, ensuring quality and hygiene. 
 Develop, optimise and use the standard operational procedures. 
 Ad hoc tasks in the kitchen. 
 
   
 More About Us 
 We are a small team with 10+ passionate and professionals from around the world. We work together as a family. Whoever you are, we are equal and we treat each other with care and respect. 
 Hot Pot Republic is an Asian restaurant in Vesterbro which pioneer in bringing Asian hot pot to Copenhagen, most probably in Denmark! 😄 Hot pot is also one of the most social dining formats in the world. In Hot Pot Republic, we offer not just meals, we work with artists and creative communities giving our guests a memorable experience.  
   
 Curious to chat with us? 
 Send us your CV to  fk@hotpotrepublic.dk 
 www.hotpotrepublic.dk 
 #hotpotrepublic
